price: 123. Nummah moominiiney Badri Qeebih Saaku Yalli sin cateeh sin Qokleh, ixxuu kee Silac dagiina Siinit Sugte waqdi, Toysa isin Yallak meesita kay niqmatal kaa faatita mara takkeenimkeh.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِبَدۡرٖ وَأَنتُمۡ أَذِلَّةٞۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad naṣarakumu al-lahu bibadrin wa-antum adhillatun fa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tashkurūna
